subject: Weekly Report
body:
Hi,
Please find attached the weekly report.
Best,
Dave

subject: Birthday Party
body:
Hey,
Are you coming to my birthday party this Saturday?
Cheers,
Emma

subject: Invoice Reminder
body:
Hello,
Just a reminder that invoice #123 is due tomorrow.
Thanks,
Frank

subject: Team Meeting
body:
Hi,
Can we reschedule the team meeting to Thursday?
Best,
Grace

subject: Vacation Request
body:
Hello,
I would like to request vacation from Dec 1 to Dec 10.
Thanks,
Harry

subject: Project Deadline
body:
Hi,
Reminder: the project deadline is next Monday.
Best,
Irene

subject: Conference Invite
body:
Hello,
You are invited to attend the AI conference next month.
Cheers,
Jack

subject: New Guidelines
body:
Hi,
Please review the new company guidelines attached.
Best,
Kate

subject: Lunch Meeting
body:
Hey,
Shall we have a lunch meeting tomorrow at 12pm?
Cheers,
Leo

subject: Document Review
body:
Hello,
Can you review the document I sent yesterday?
Thanks,
Mia
